## QueueEventsListener."waiting-children" property

Listen to 'waiting-children' event.

This event is triggered when a job enters the 'waiting-children' state.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
'waiting-children': (args: {
        jobId: string;
    }, id: string) => void;
```
